metadata.title: ALDER'S ADDITIONS
metadata.author: Alder
metadata.description:
PATCH AFTER MULTIVERSE 5.5 AND FUSION 0.1.5+ This addon for FTL: Multiverse incorporates a significant array of new equipment that can be found on your runs, as well as a few quests and small features to enhance gameplay variety.
Special thanks to: - Tabbi, Nauter, and Terry, for balancing feedback. - Crow and Willow, for writing assistance. - R4V3-ON and Laythe, for encouragement and art tips. - Chrono Vortex, Julk, Arc, Vertaalfout, and Sillysandvich for guiding me through Lua scripting.
